localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A procedurally-generated pencil and paper dungeon that you can easily carry in the back pocket of your jeans. Every book is unique, because each page is randomly generated. Levels are generated using Python and Drawbot to create a unique PDF for every copy.
blogPost.body: A procedurally-generated pencil and paper dungeon that you can easily carry in the back pocket of your jeans. Every book is unique, because each page is randomly generated. Levels are generated using Python and Drawbot to create a unique PDF for every copy.
blogPost.title: Paper Apps™ DUNGEON - Randomly generated notebook game
blogPost.author: Tom Brinton

localize.description: 一个程序生成的纸笔地牢，你可以轻松地放在牛仔裤的后口袋里。每本书都是独一无二的，因为每一页都是随机生成的。关卡使用Python和Drawbot生成，为每个副本创建一个独特的PDF。
localize.tagline: 随机生成的笔记本游戏

localize.description: 一個程序生成的紙筆地牢，你可以輕鬆地放在牛仔褲的後口袋裏。每本書都是獨一無二的，因爲每一頁都是隨機生成的。關卡使用Python和Drawbot生成，爲每個副本創建一個獨特的PDF。
localize.tagline: 隨機生成的筆記本遊戲

previous.excerpt: Time is the most important thing, save it! You can remove uploading product images from your to-do list, Smart Image Upload handles all of your product images at once.
previous.title: Smart Image Upload for Shopify - Bulk upload product images and save your time

localize.description: 时间是最重要的，节约时间吧! 您可以将上传产品图片从您的待办事项中删除，智能图片上传一次处理所有的产品图片。
localize.tagline: 批量上传产品图片，节省您的时间

localize.description: 時間是最重要的，節約時間吧! 您可以將上傳產品圖片從您的待辦事項中刪除，智能圖片上傳一次處理所有的產品圖片。
localize.tagline: 批量上傳產品圖片，節省您的時間
